name: Mom Koser's German Chocolate Cake Cookies
comments: If making this at altitudes above 3500 ft
ingredients: 1 (18.25 oz.) pkg. pudding included German chocolate cake mix
instructions: Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Combine all ingredients in large bowl. Drop by rounded teaspoonfuls 2" apart onto ungreased cookie sheet. Bake 8-10 minutes or until set. Cool 1 minute, then remove from cookie sheet.
